title: Alaks1
author: Alaks1
content: Hello guys,I got a friend who want to ship me jewelry, shoes and few raybans thru DHL but it got rejected 2 times and they dont tell himAnyone have another way? or a past experience shipping to the middle east?there is nothing shady about it, all of them got the receipt that are legally purchase and mine

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: what's the reason provide DHL? did you get back these items? in this case you need to ask to delivery service why has been refused as service... other way .... try another service like fedex etc etc

comments.author: Alaks1
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on September 25, 2023, 12:51:31 PMwhat's the reason provide DHL? did you get back these items? in this case you need to ask to delivery service why has been refused as service... other way .... try another service like fedex etc etctwo times they said its the wrong packaging altho my friend whos shipping them followed the instructionsI dont think FedEx is available in lebanon i have to double check

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: https://www.upu.int/en/Universal-Postal-Union/About-UPU/Member-Countries?csid=-1&cid=175Lebanon is member of UPU. You can use just national postal service for this kind of shipment. Most of times I used this here in Italy also for shipment abroad since it's cheap and well managed.
